message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll take 60, you get 40. What do you say?
You're starting high, I'll meet you in the middle
You're not meeting me high enough. I'll take 50, you can have 50.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bit more. 55 for me, 45 for you. Take it or leave it.
You're getting closer, but I'm not giving up yet
You're still not giving me enough. I'll take 52, you can have 48.
I'm not budging much, but I'll give you a tiny bit more. 52.5 for me, 47.5 for you. Final offer.
I'm not giving up, I'll try to squeeze a bit more out of this
You're getting too greedy. I'll take 53, you can have 47.
I'm not backing down. 53.5 for me, 46.5 for you. This is my final offer.
I'm getting desperate, but I'm not giving up completely
You're really lowballing me now. I'll take 54, you can have 46.
I'm not going to give up now. 54.5 for me, 45.5 for you. This is my last offer.
I'm not giving you the whole pie, I want a bigger slice
Fine, you win. I'll take 10, you can have 90.
